info.name: IRCCloud - Dark Matter Reloaded
info.description: New version for the Dark Matter theme
info.additionalInfo:
FIXED: Input border (and bgcolor)
FIXED: Mention highlight background-color (AGAIN)
FIXED: "Set Topic" link color...
FIXED: Horizontal scroll on sidebar...

This release still in alpha... for testing purpose only! Please, send me any requests or bugs!

- Updated nick colors
- Updated some popups and dialogs (still some left)

data.title: There is no highlight when I am pinged.
Set topic is invisible until mouse over.
Love it but needs one thing
